snippet: A Columbia graduate student’s discovery of an unknown 1941 novel by Claude McKay has been authenticated.
abstract: Manuscript of a novel titled Amiable With Big Teeth: A Novel of the Love Affair Between the Communists and the Poor Black Sheep of Harlem is discovered in an archive at Columbia University and authenticated as the work of Harlem Renaissance writer Claude McKay.
lead_paragraph: A Columbia graduate student’s discovery of an unknown 1941 novel by Claude McKay has been authenticated.

headline.seo: Harlem Renaissance Novel by Claude McKay Is Discovered
headline.main: New Novel of Harlem Renaissance Is Found
headline.print_headline: New Novel Of Harlem Renaissance Is Found

keywords.value: Amiable With Big Teeth: A Novel of the Love Affair Between the Communists and the Poor Black Sheep of Harlem (Book)
